long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smooth Dash is a simple 'New Tab' dashboard. Upgrade your current dashboard by displaying the local weather, being productive with the to-do lists and customising your background.

Current Features:
- Live (+ Future) Weather Status
- Date/Time Display
- Google Search
- To Do List
- Notes
- Pomodoro Timer
- Lofi Chill
- Different Backgrounds!
